column1: question@option1@option2@option3@option4@correct
Question@"Option 1"@"Option 2"@"Option 3"@"Option 4"@"Correct"
What will be the output of print(2 * 3 + 1)@"5"@"7"@"6"@"9"@"7"
Which of the following is a mutable data type in Python?@"int"@"tuple"@"list"@"str"@"list"
How do you declare a variable in Python?@"var x = 5"@"x := 5"@"x = 5"@"let x = 5"@"x = 5"
What is the output of len('hello')?@"5"@"4"@"6"@"None"@"5"
Which of these is not a valid Python keyword?@"if"@"then"@"else"@"while"@"then"
What is the default value for an argument in a function?@"None"@"0"@"empty string"@"False"@"None"
What is the method to remove the last item from a list?@"remove()"@"pop()"@"delete()"@"clear()"@"pop()"
How would you define a function in Python?@"function myFunc()"@"def myFunc():"@"func myFunc()"@"def myFunc(){}"@"def myFunc():"
Which of the following are immutable types?@"list"@"dict"@"tuple"@"set"@"tuple"
What is the purpose of the 'break' statement in Python?@"To skip an iteration"@"To exit the loop immediately"@"To continue to the next iteration"@"To pause the program"@"To exit the loop immediately"
How can you generate a random integer between 1 and 10 in Python?@"random(1@ 10)"@"randint(1@ 10)"@"randrange(1@ 10)"@"random.randint(1@ 10)"@"randint(1@ 10)"
Which of the following data types is used to store a sequence of characters?@"list"@"str"@"int"@"tuple"@"str"
What does the 'continue' statement do in Python?@"Stops the loop"@"Exits the loop"@"Skips the rest of the code inside the loop"@"None of the above"@"Skips the rest of the code inside the loop"
How do you open a file in read mode?@"open('file.txt'@ 'r')"@"open('file.txt'@ 'w')"@"open('file.txt'@ 'a')"@"open('file.txt'@ 'rb')"@"open('file.txt'@ 'r')"
What is the output of 5 % 2 in Python?@"2"@"1"@"0"@"5"@"1"
Which of the following is used for string formatting in Python?@"{0}"@"%d"@".format()"@"string.format()"@".format()"

What is the purpose of the 'pass' statement?@"To break the loop"@"To continue to the next iteration"@"To do nothing@ used as a placeholder"@"To stop the program"@"To do nothing@ used as a placeholder"
Which method would you use to add an element to the end of a list?@"insert()"@"append()"@"add()"@"extend()"@"append()"

What does the following code do? result = [x for x in range(5) if x % 2 == 0]@"Creates a list of even numbers from 0 to 5"@"Creates a list of odd numbers from 1 to 5"@"Creates a list of numbers divisible by 2"@"Generates a list of numbers greater than 0"@"Creates a list of even numbers from 0 to 5"
What is the correct way to import the math module in Python?@"import math"@"include math"@"use math"@"import math()"@"import math"
